channel.title: Argoury
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ukLVE5N.gif[/img] [FONT=Arial Narrow][B]Welcome, Valuable Player, To Argoury! We know words don’t mean much unless there’s action to prove it, So preview our server TODAY![/B][/FONT]
[U][FONT=Arial Black]What is Argoury?[/FONT][/U]
Argoury is a server that strives to give you, the players, the community, the best we can offer.
Our team is always striving to make frequent updates to Argoury, your wish is our command.
Argoury is very economy efficient, clean cut, and very well done; with everything we do, being professional is key.
Success is imminent and our team at Argoury would like to welcome you to join our journey.
[SIZE=3][U][URL=http://"http://argoury.net"]Forums[/URL][/U][/SIZE] - [SIZE=3][U][URL=http://"http://argoury.net/download/Argoury.jar"]Download[/URL][/U]
[B]Duel Arena Pest Control Fight Kiln Fight Caves Questing Custom Vote system Highscores GrandExchange Clan Wars Stealing Creation SoulWars Shooting Stars Construction TriviaBot Skilling Pvp Custom Tranining island Custom donation system Come check out Argoury.[/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/NNzCdFr.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/d8jhIE9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/RW3tNhM.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1GH9gB1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/xajmxwm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/pwAxqAE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GPG0ZVf.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rnwJlBm.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VRcqIuH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/33OeNMQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vdaJ3N0.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Q778hHQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DfyAr9y.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VmHpPQS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YRbgWsS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/MV9jt9V.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0NbH1qO.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/NI0C5Vg.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/BJaTjrI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PSfvYl8.png[/img]

item.description:

item.title: Argoury
item.dc:creator: @gavman9966 gavman9966
item.description:
@gavman9966 wrote:

Update Log
Client v1.5 (Client Updater, and more)
Fix trading at home
Dicing teleport added to minigames section in teleport
Add star dust shop and Trivia point shop
Removing Argoury Game and add Pest control
Server updates on vps for performance wise.
Website was Majorly updated
More as players request!

Read full topic

item.title: Argoury
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

This looks decent with a few nice screenshots that would seem compelling. I would work on a nice, custom forum theme that would make this entirely pop out with each other. Good luck.
